tag_list: toyna-chin, womens-health, teen-health, hygeia-personal-care-products, petite-amie, jolie-mama
overview:
Toyna is currently a Marketing Consultant focusing on early and growth stage women’s health products/companies in the medical device space.

She was previously the Founder of Hygeia Personal Care Products, Inc. a womenâ€™s health company focusing on the pediatric and adolescent gynecology market specifically precocious puberty in young women. The overall mission was to provide young girls with the right products at the appropriate stage, accurate health information as they navigate development.

Toyna is also an active advisor and currently is a business advisor to Kindara, Center for Women’s Business Advancement at Southern New Hampshire University and the Entrepreneur Network Student Mentoring Initiative of Southern New Hampshire University.

Ms. Chin holds a US Patent - 20070088623 and is an author of a series of adolescent books (avialable in 2013) based on the Tanner chart stages of puberty in girls. She also lends her time to Friends of the United Nations Population Fund.
